√śas 'cut'

present: [2.] śasta (2p.)  śāsti  śā́sati  śā́satu (3p.)  aśāt (3s.)   -- [1.] śasatha  śásanti  aśasat  

perfect: śaśāsa  śaśasus  

future: [1.] śasiṣyati   -- [2.] śasitā  

verbal: śasta  -śasya  -śásas  

secondary: passive: śasyáte etc. B.+   -- desiderative: śiśāsiṣant  

derivatives: -śas  śāsá AV.B.S.  śásana V.+  śasitṛ B.+  śástṛ V.+  śastrá B.+  -śāstṛ B.S.  -śiśāsiṣu B.
